channel.title: No connection in Kicksecure AppVM based on Qubes template debian-11-minimal
channel.description:
There is no internet connection on AppVMs based on qubes-kicksecure (using distro morphing)
To reproduce:
- Install debian 11 minimal - Install kicksecure using distro morphine method - Create AppVM based on kicksecure template

item.title: No connection in Kicksecure AppVM based on Qubes template debian-11-minimal
item.dc:creator: nurmagoz
item.description:
Patrick:

no internet connection or only APT / Tor broken?

only APT / Tor broken (yeah confusing what i have said)

coconutter:

Did you install the suggested packages for minimal templates, such as those necessary for networking etc?

No because these doesnt help, I dont want kicksecure as netvm or compatible with USB or VPN-VMâ€¦ just normal/minimal working VM.

But anyway i just tested this again and i cant have this issue anymore, So mark as resolved.

Read full topic
item.source: No connection in Kicksecure AppVM based on Qubes template debian-11-minimal

item.title: No connection in Kicksecure AppVM based on Qubes template debian-11-minimal
item.dc:creator: coconutter
item.description:
Did you install the suggested packages for minimal templates, such as those necessary for networking etc?

eg qubes-core-agent-networking
qubes-core-agent-network-manager

Qubes OS

Minimal templates

The minimal templates are lightweight versions of their standard template counterparts. They have only the most vital packages installed, including a minimal X and xterm installation. When properly configured and used, minimal templates can be less...

item.title: No connection in Kicksecure AppVM based on Qubes template debian-11-minimal
item.dc:creator: nurmagoz
item.description:
I have figured out why when installing kicksecure in qubes no networking going to work, Tor wont connect at all in kicksecure-qubes by itself unless you restart it (shutdown-restart the VM wont solve it unless done manually)

dont know why this is happening.

Read full topic
